title: Unknown
description: Librarian's Note: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here"I was a Reaper and he was a Seeker,He was meant to kill me and I to him,Then how can in our poisonous and mad game,love thread?" * * * * *Have you ever thought who you really are? Do you really know the people you love? How much sacrifice can you do to save the people you love? To find the real yourself you have to step in Amy's life train to know the unknown.
author: Alison  Swan
